parameter.name: 16-bit source address
parameter.description: 16-bit network address of the sender device.\n\nSet to 'FF FE' (unknown 16-bit address) if the sender's 16-bit address is unknown.

parameter.name: RSSI
parameter.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator. Hexadecimal equivalent of (-dBm) value. I.E. for a RX signal strength of -40 dBm, a 28 hexadecimal value (40 decimal) is returned.

parameter.name: Options
parameter.description:
Bitfield indicating the Rx indicator options.

bit 0 - [reserved]
bit 1 - Address broadcast
bit 2 - PAN broadcast
bits 3-7 - [reserved]

parameter.name: RF data
parameter.description: Up to 100 bytes of IO and ADC data.
